original_text: But he said, ‘No, lest in gathering the weeds you root up the wheat along with them.
korean_text: 주인이 이르되 가만 두라 가라지를 뽑다가 곡식까지 뽑을까 염려하노라

sentences.original_text: lest in gathering the weeds you root up the wheat along with them.
sentences.korean_translation: 가라지를 거둘 때에 밀까지 뽑을까 염려하노라.
